messages.subject: Children's behavior in public (blog post by a grown unschooler)
messages.msgSnippet: Brenna McBroom, a young adult who was unschooled for a long time wrote a great blog post:
messages.messageBody:
Brenna McBroom, a young adult who was unschooled for a long time wrote a great blog post:
http://brennamcbroom.wordpress.com/2012/11/06/things-that-hold-unschooling-back/

I hadn't seen this, but Frank Maier mentioned it in the chat today.

One of the comments kept me from commenting. :-)

But the second point is important: "Here�s a question that I think it would behoove parents to ask themselves, both while at conferences and in their day to day lives: �Is my child�s behavior creating negative externalities for other people?� When the answer to that question turns into a �yes,� then it is time for you to intervene."

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
